text: The 2005 Tour de Hongrie was the 32nd edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 2 to 7 August 2005. The race started in Veszprém and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Tamás Lengyel. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | P-Nívó Betonexpressz | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Podbrezová | style="text-align:right;" | + 45" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Cyclingnews.com | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 53" |} |} ==References== 2005 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
